评论详情: super cute sweatshirt. its not a very thick material, the inside kinda feels like a sports jersey but its still comfy and nice.

This roomy sweatshirt is incredibly cozy and warm. While it's lightweight since it's not made of cotton or fleece, it's perfect for those cooler days.  The designs are tasteful and stylish, not over-the-top. They have maintained their quality even after multiple washes and wears. All in all, it's a soft and comfortable sweatshirt that I plan to wear mainly in the spring.
This enormous vintage graphic sweatshirt is extremely comfy and has a cool casual, streetwear attitude.
The head area is very small. I could not get my head through the shirt. I got this for myself and I am a woman. I’d highly recommend sizing up at least two sizes

My daughter needed a "sports" themed outfit for a school event and this looked like it would be pretty soft and comfy, so we ordered it, and she loves it.  she wears it all the time now, my sister thinks it is funny as she was born in 74 and it makes her smile every time she sees it, so for one sweatshirt I made two women in my life happy, I consider that a win!
This vintage sweatshirt is really great quality and it works fantastic. It's well made and the craftsmanship is really nice. I got this for my son and he loves it.

Love this soft, oversized sweatshirt! It represents for me, #74 - Ben Williams, the first African-American to play in a varsity football game for Ole Miss. It makes a great conversation starter and allows me to be comfortable and look great - win-win-win! Washes and dries well, as it is a polyester blend. Recommend!

评论概述: The material is a faux suede, but it is nice
评论详情: The material is a faux suede, but it is nice

评论概述: Surprisingly warm and comfortable, a bit overpriced
评论详情: Although this is just a crewneck shirt, I was pleasantly surprised by how warm this garment is. It's not super thick like a fleece crewneck, but it's lined and definitely something that you can layer in the fall to stay warm. The color is nice and the design elements seem to be quality and haven't shown any wear or tear as I've washed this.  I will say that the lining isn't super breathable and feels very synthetic and almost rubbery. I've found that this makes it take much longer to air dry after a wash. All of that being said, I'm not convinced that this garment is worth the price its listed at. This crewneck is comfortable enough and I like the style of it, but it's not like there are many fine details that make it worth it at this price point. It's a generic print on a long sleeve crewneck - nothing "vintage" about it and nothing outstanding about the construction or design.  I will update my review should anything change with the quality over time as I wear it, but after a month of wear I like this crewneck just fine, but not enough to justify the price. The construction is solid but not really what I expected for a list price of $46.

I love this sweatshirt, it’s oversized which I like and it fits just the way I like it lol. It’s so comfortable and really keeps you warm. I also love how soft this sweatshirt is and how good it feels on.  It would look good with jeans or leggings. It seems like it’s made with good quality and I love the vintage look.  Would Recommend!!

This too is definitely oversized in length. I’m 5’0 and it stops at my knees. It’s perfect to pair with some biker shorts or leggings. The fabric reminds me of suede and is on the thicker side, very comfortable and not too hot. I’d recommend!

The equality of this sweater is very impressive especially considering the price. It fits nicely and the design is also applied onto the sweater very nicely. It’s very soft comfortable and breathable plus i get the perfect oversized fit!

This is a true oversized pullover. It is thicker than a normal t shirt but not as heavy as a typical crew neck. It is very soft on the inside and outside. It looks exactly as the picture. Will be great to lounge or take out while running errands on chillier days that you don't want to wear a whole sweater because the sun will probably come out am make you hot lol
This oversized sweatshirt fits true to size. Exactly as pictured. Can be worn with shorts, jeans, leggings. Lightweight but can keep you warm. Washes well. Nice colors, great graphics.

true to size and the material is heavenly for the sensory issues i have — it’s SO soft, and i wish i could have gotten a bigger size to further make this sweater even oversized, but as of typing this they only go up to XL. still would highly recommend though!

First, I'm a product tester meaning my reviews are 100% critical.  I couldn't find anything not to like on this.  Now I'm 63 and retired after 32 years USMC so I've seen good and the bad.  The sizing is true and it's so comfortable.  The stitching is good and the detailing also is done well.  It's perfect for those days when there's just a chill.  Enjoy!

This runs true to size and the graphics are as pictured. When it arrived, I was surprised by the material. It is more of a sueded microfiber and not a "sweatshirt". I was expecting a fleece type of material. This is very different and has a different look, feel, and drape to it. The bottom does not have a band and is open - just something to note from a style perspective. It's not a bad top, but is not what I was expecting. It is not a t-shirt, as it is much heavier.

Hey Everyone, Dori here. This sweatshirt is very soft and it fits just the way I want it to. I ordered dark grey xl. It's nicely oversized and it is so cozy and comfortable. I love that it's oversized. My hubs wants it but it's just a little bit to small for him to be comfortable wearing it so it's all mine lol worth it. recommended.

This is a great quality sweatshirt. The material an excellent grade, and it’s also soft and comfortable. The fit is nice and as expected. The look was a lot better than expected. Not that it didn't’ look nice when we chose it, it’s simply overall nicer looking in person.
one of my favorite sweatshirts. So fun and different. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for a good vintage looking sweatshirt.
LOVE THE FABRIC. SUPER SOFT, GOOD QUALITY, THICK MATERIAL.

I like it a lot! Super trendy. The material is super soft & comfy. Good sizing, fits pretty well. Haven’t washed it yet so i’m not sure how durable it is. But i’m happy with it so far. It’s almost the same exact shirt that all the other Amazon streetwear brands are selling though.
I wouldn’t consider this an oversized sweater.i got my son a medium and it fits like a regular small. The material is really soft and feels good against the skin. It washes well.

评论概述: VERY big! I normally wear an XL and an M worked just fine.
评论详情: This sweatshirt is MASSIVE. I normally wear an XL but this Medium worked just fine and has plenty of room to spare. The fabric is interesting. It has a suede feel on the outside and it has no fleece inside, but it's very warm. Super soft and comfortable and the material launders well. As long as you pay attention to the size chart and don't order your normal size, I really recommend this shirt!

Material is very nice and feels like suede.  The racing stripes are contrasting material sewed into the sleeve itself.  Construction is excellent.  I thought I had ordered an XL but received a medium.  My XL son was able to get this on -  though it was tight on him -  so this is a truly oversized shirt.  Order accordingly.

This oversized sweatshirt caught my eye because it sported the number 74... which is the year I graduated from high school. I decided that I really needed to add it to my winter wardrobe, and I'm glad I did. First off, consult the size chart for more accurate sizing. I normally wear a large, but after viewing the size chart, I decided to drop down a size, and the medium fit just as I'd expect a large to fit. If you like really baggy/loose clothing, order your normal size because this is truly oversized. The sweatshirt itself is very well made with seams finished properly and no hanging threads. The fabric itself is interesting -- it feels very soft on the outside, kind of like it's brushed. I really love the feel! All in all, this is a very comfortable sweatshirt that looks great on me. I will be wearing it frequently all fall and winter!

I sized up to an XL for a roomy fit. I am 5'5" 155 lbs. I washed on cold and dried in high and it didn't shrink.  The fabric is kind of a brushed fabric. Initially, out of the package I thought it was weird, but after washing I liked it a lot better. It's very lightweight and comfortable and does give that retro, vintage vibe.  The detail on the one sleeve near the cuff is stitched on detail. The rest is a vinyl.
Very comfortable and soft is a little small but not a problem great product
